transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sayyam ji se baat ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Haan ji haan.
Executive: Sayyam ji main Ashutosh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Main Ashutosh baat kar raha hu. Haan haan batao. Haan haan. Ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Actually kya tha ki sir ka call aa gaya tha. Par woh shayad galti se lag gaya tha. Toh ek ticket raise ho jati hai usme. Haan feedback raise ho jata hai. Baki maine jo aapka address change kiya tha na, woh maine daal diya tha aur woh shayad ho bhi gaya hai. Abhi aap check kar sakte hai kya desktop pe? Kya kya karu?
Executive: Haan abhi aap check kar sakte hai desktop se. Kaise? Main karta hu. Karta hu karta hu. Theek hai sir. Ek minute rukiye disconnect mat kariye.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye main bhej deta hu yaha se. Screenshot ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Disconnect karenge toh woh feedback nahi ja payega isliye.

Executive: Main bhej raha hu ek minute.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan dekhiye WhatsApp pe aaya hoga.
Customer: WhatsApp ke liye sir aapko call katna padega.
Executive: Achha iske liye abhi screen pe. Theek hai ek baar se check kar leta hu wapis call karta hu phir. Theek hai? Haan. Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to check address change status.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed address change was done.

- Executive sent a screenshot on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- address change, feedback, whatsapp
